task.title: Remove Inline Tags
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove inline tags from a TMX file.

context.p: The presence of inline tags may have an adverse effect when retrieving TM matches if a penalty is applied for missing or differences in inline tags.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to process.
In main menu, select Tasks Remove All Tags .

taskbody.result: A progress dialog is displayed while inline tags are removed. The editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
